name: Basketball Racer
description:
This started as a small project for university, but I have recently decided to revisit the concept of a racing game with a super-fast basketball as the vehicle.

Controls are simple: WASD or arrow keys to move, or left thumb stick if you're using a controller. "R" to quick restart. "L" to reset your highest score.

Very basic game, it'll probably last about 30-60 minutes of gameplay.

Version 0.3.7

  • Added 7th track
  • Added high scores screen. Mine is in the screenshots list, bet you can't beat them!

Known issues

  • Leaving the "First track ever" level with the escape button may crash the game, or cause it to lag horribly while the main menu loads, and every time you load a level after that.

Detailed Patch notes: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Q7oyjgvjTMrByTVtv7HvxgQO-825QMmMLVfP25KwZWo/...

Soundtrack credits to Waterflame, and TechnoAxe

If you wish to contact me, please email damien.stergio@gmail.com
